question: Which country has permitted Dubai Royals to hunt 'Houbara bustard'?
explanation:
The Pakistan government has issued special permits to Dubai Ruler and six other members of the ruling family to hunt the internationally protected bird Houbara bustard.
As per media report, the permit was issued to hunt during the 2020-21 hunting season. Among the large terrestrial bird typically found in parts of Asia, the Middle East and Africa, the Asian houbara is related to great Indian bustard.
